items.arabicText: إِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ اللَّهُ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ

translation.nl: Voorwaar, uw Heer is Allah die de hemelen en de aarde heeft geschapen.
translation.en: Indeed, your Lord is Allah who created the heavens and the earth.
translation.tr: Şüphesiz, Rabbiniz gökleri ve yeri yaratan Allah'tır.
translation.pl: Zaprawdę, wasz Pan to Allah, który stworzył niebiosa i ziemię.

items.commentary: This Ayah emphasizes the creation of the universe by Allah.

items.arabicText: حُرِّمَتْ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَيْتَةُ وَالدَّمُ وَلَحْمُ الْخِنزِيرِ

translation.nl: Verboden voor u is dood vlees, bloed en varkensvlees.
translation.en: Forbidden to you is dead meat, blood, and pork.
translation.tr: Ölü eti, kan ve domuz eti size haram kılınmıştır.
translation.pl: Zakazane dla was jest mięso martwego, krew i wieprzowina.

items.commentary: This Ayah prohibits the consumption of certain items.
